# Data Loading

`{bash, engine.opts='-l'}
cat ../data/bad.csv.part* >> ../data/bad.csv
cat ../data/good.csv.part* >> ../data/good.csv
`

```{r}
bad <- read.csv("../data/bad.csv", nrows = 200)
bad$signal <- FALSE
good <- read.csv("../data/good.csv", nrows = 200)
good$signal <- TRUE
glimpse(good)
df <- rbind(bad, good)
```
